snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes Ira Glass answering questions, a tale of the S.E.C. pushing Facebook to reveal risks before its stock offering...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes Ira Glass answering questions, a tale of the S.E.C. pushing Facebook to reveal risks before its stock offering and more online retailers opening offline stores.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Antarctican Visions and Hipstamatic's Struggle
